entities.name: gryffindor
entities.description: Gryffindor house is mentioned as the group that Harry clapped with when Euan Abercrombie was sorted into it.

entities.name: euan abercrombie
entities.description: Euan Abercrombie is a student who was sorted into Gryffindor house during the sorting ceremony.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student who participated in the sorting ceremony and clapped with the rest of Gryffindor house when Euan Abercrombie was sorted into it.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron's stomach is mentioned as being hungry during the sorting ceremony.

entities.name: zeller
entities.description: Zeller is a student who was sorted into Hufflepuff house during the sorting ceremony.

entities.name: rose
entities.description: Rose is a student who was sorted into Hufflepuff house along with Zeller.

entities.name: hufflepuff
entities.description: Hufflepuff house is mentioned as the group that Zeller and Rose were sorted into during the sorting ceremony.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is a teacher who picked up the hat and stool to march away with Zeller and Rose after they were sorted into Hufflepuff house.

entities.name: professor dumbledore
entities.description: Professor Dumbledore is a teacher who rose to his feet during the sorting ceremony.

relationships.description: Euan Abercrombie was sorted into Gryffindor house during the sorting ceremony.
Harry is a member of Gryffindor house.
Ron is Harry's friend, as indicated by the fact that they are together during the sorting ceremony.
Zeller was sorted into Hufflepuff house during the sorting ceremony.
Rose was sorted into Hufflepuff house along with Zeller.
Professor McGonagall is the supervisor of Zeller, as indicated by her picking up the hat and stool to march away with him after he was sorted into Hufflepuff house.
Professor McGonagall is also the supervisor of Rose, as indicated by her picking up the hat and stool to march away with her after she was sorted into Hufflepuff house.
